join.sh_all: select count(*) from joint_office_info as a LEFT join property_info as b on a.property_id = b.property_id and b.`status` = 1 where a.`status` = 1 and a.city_id = 310100;
join.country: SELECT count( * ) FROM joint_office_info AS a LEFT JOIN property_info AS b ON a.property_id = b.property_id WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND a.city_id = 310100 AND b.county_id = 310104 AND b.`status` = 1;
join.business:
SELECT
	count( * ) 
FROM
	joint_office_info AS a
	LEFT JOIN property_info AS b ON a.property_id = b.property_id 
	LEFT JOIN property_business_relation as c on c.property_id = a.property_id
WHERE
	a.`status` = 1 
	AND b.`status` = 1
	AND c.`status` = 1
	AND a.city_id = 310100 
	AND b.county_id = 310104 
	AND c.business_id = 2223;
join.area:
SELECT count(0) FROM (SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id,
	joint_office_info j
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON o.joint_id = j.joint_id 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
WHERE
	j.`property_id` = i.`property_id` 
	AND j.`status` = 1 
	AND i.`status` = 1 
	AND j.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.unit_area >= 100 
	AND o.unit_area <=300
GROUP BY
	j.`joint_id` 
ORDER BY
	j.sort DESC,
	j.update_time DESC) as a
join.num:
SELECT count(0) FROM (SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id,
	joint_office_info j
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON o.joint_id = j.joint_id 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
WHERE
	j.`property_id` = i.`property_id` 
	AND j.`status` = 1 
	AND i.`status` = 1 
	AND j.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.`station_number_end` >= 8 
	AND o.`station_number_start` <=15 
GROUP BY
	j.`joint_id` 
ORDER BY
	j.sort DESC,
	j.update_time DESC) as a
join.price:
SELECT
	count(*) 
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		count(*)
	FROM
		property_info i
		LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id,
		joint_office_info j
		LEFT JOIN office_info o ON o.joint_id = j.joint_id 
		AND o.`status` = 1 
	WHERE
		j.`property_id` = i.`property_id` 
		AND j.`status` = 1 
		AND i.`status` = 1 
		AND j.city_id = 310100 
		AND j.price >= '800' 
		AND j.price <= '1500' 
	GROUP BY
	j.`joint_id` 
	) table_count
join.decorate:
SELECT count(0) FROM (SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id,
	joint_office_info j
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON o.joint_id = j.joint_id 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
WHERE
	j.`property_id` = i.`property_id` 
	AND j.`status` = 1 
	AND i.`status` = 1 
	AND j.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.decoration_name LIKE CONCAT( '%', '简单装修', '%' )
GROUP BY
	j.`joint_id` 
ORDER BY
	j.sort DESC,
	j.update_time DESC) as a
join.brand:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	joint_office_info 
WHERE
	joint_brand = 2 
	AND city_id = 310100 
	AND STATUS = 1

off.sh_all:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1
off.country:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id`

	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND c.county_id = 310104
off.business:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND i.`property_id` IN ( SELECT property_id FROM property_business_relation WHERE business_id = 2223 AND STATUS = 1) 
	AND c.county_id = 310104
off.type:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND o.building_type LIKE CONCAT( '%写字楼%' )

SELECT

	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1

off.price:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND o.price >= 7 
	AND o.price <=9
off.decorate:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND o.decoration_name LIKE CONCAT('%简单装修%')
off.feature:
SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND o.`status` = 1 
	AND o.city_id = 310100 
	AND o.office_form_type = 1 
	AND o.`office_id` IN (SELECT
				assets_id
			FROM
				assets_feature_relation 
			WHERE
				feature_id IN (337) 
				AND STATUS = 1 
				AND type = 2 
			GROUP BY
				assets_id 
			HAVING
				COUNT(`assets_id`) =1)

pro.sh_all:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	(
SELECT
	count(*) 
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
	AND o.`status` = 1
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND i.city_id = 310100 
GROUP BY
	i.`property_id` 
	) AS a

pro.num:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		count(*)
	FROM
		property_info i
		LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
		AND o.`status` = 1
		LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id 
	WHERE
		i.`status` = 1 
		AND i.city_id = 310100 
		AND o.`station_number_end` >= 8 
		AND o.`station_number_start` <=15 
	GROUP BY
		i.`property_id` 
	ORDER BY
		i.sort DESC 
	) AS a
pro.price:
SELECT count(0) 
from (SELECT
		count(*) 
	FROM
		property_info i
		LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` AND o.`status` = 1
		LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id 
	WHERE
		i.`status` = 1 
		AND i.city_id = 310100 
		AND
			CASE
				WHEN o.price IS NOT NULL THEN
				o.price >= 7 ELSE ( CASE WHEN i.min_price IS NOT NULL THEN i.min_price >= 7 ELSE i.average_price >= 7 END ) 
			END 
		AND
			CASE
				WHEN o.price IS NOT NULL THEN
				o.price <=9 ELSE ( CASE WHEN i.max_price IS NOT NULL THEN i.max_price <=9 ELSE i.average_price <=9 END ) 
			END 
		GROUP BY
			i.`property_id` 
		ORDER BY
			i.sort DESC) as a
pro.decorate:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		count(*) 
	FROM
		property_info i
		LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` AND o.`status` = 1
		LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id 
	WHERE
		i.`status` = 1 
		AND i.city_id = 310100 
		AND o.decoration_name LIKE CONCAT('%简单装修%') 
	GROUP BY
		i.`property_id` 
	ORDER BY
		i.sort DESC 
	) AS a
pro.feature:
SELECT
	count(0) 
FROM
	(
SELECT
	count(*) 
FROM
	property_info i
	LEFT JOIN office_info o ON i.`property_id` = o.`property_id` 
	AND o.`status` = 1
	LEFT JOIN county_info c ON i.county_id = c.county_id 
WHERE
	i.`status` = 1 
	AND i.city_id = 310100 
	AND i.`property_id` IN ( SELECT assets_id FROM assets_feature_relation WHERE feature_id IN ( 395 ) AND STATUS = 1 AND type = 1 GROUP BY assets_id HAVING COUNT( `assets_id` ) = 1 ) 
GROUP BY
	i.`property_id` 
ORDER BY
	i.sort DESC 
	) AS a
